page.title: 20The Calderdale Way
page.content: (The Calderdale Way,)which was opened in 1978, is a fifty mile walk using mainly footpaths and tracks round the boundary of Calderdale. In 1974 Calderdale Metropolitan Borough Council was formed. Local people didn't like this, they thought it was too large. A group of people planned a walk that was special to the new area to help improve attitudes. During the year it is possible to see (26 species of birds, 12 species of (trees, over 100 plants) plus shrubs and weeds.Some people who live near the footpaths have started( Bed and (Breakfast) businesses to help vistitors walk the complete way. Strangers think Calderdale is dirty and industrial but the Calderdale way proves(Calderdale is beautiful.
